subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A year after the will-he-retire-or-won’t-he speculation became a tiresome everyday topic, Brett Favre’s 16th N.F.L. season defies easy labeling.
snippet: A year after the will-he-retire-or-won’t-he speculation became a tiresome everyday topic, Brett Favre’s 16th N.F.L. season defies easy labeling.
